wikipedia_page.main: John Charles Davy  (8 August 1927 – 28 October 1984) was a British journalist and science editor for The Observer, lecturer, vice-principal of Emerson College and Anthroposophist.

response: *John Davy (chemist) (1790–1868), British chemist and younger brother of Sir Humphy Davy
*John Davy (Blessed), English Carthusian monk executed during the English Reformation
*John Davy (journalist) (1927–1984), British journalist and science editor
